CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( ISBLANK( TEXT(Tier__c) ), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed SPAM"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed Duplicate") ) ), /*If the tier is blank, and its a dupe or spam, make the case cost the hourly CSR rate*/
(24* WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c),
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Tier__c)), (65* (WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)), /*If the Tier is blank and it isn't spam or dupe assume it will be Tier 1*/
/*IF on the June 23 2021.*/ IF ( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,6,16), Case_Cost_New__c ,
IF( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2019,7,1), CASE(TEXT(Tier__c), /*if Tier is NOT Blank*/ "CSR",(20*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)), /*CSR hourly case cost*/ "Tier 1",(45*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)),/*Tier 1 hourly case cost*/ "Tier 2 Prod",(71*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)),/*Tier 2 Prod hourly case cost*/ "Tier 2 Dev",(85*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)),/*Tier 2 Dev hourly case cost*/ "Tier 3",(165*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)),0) /* Tier 3 hourly case cost*/ , IF ( YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 2018, /* NEW COSTS */
CASE(TEXT(Tier__c), /*if Tier is NOT Blank*/ "CSR",(46*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)), /*CSR hourly case cost*/ "Tier 1",(103*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)),/*Tier 1 hourly case cost*/ "Tier 2 Prod",(90*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)),/*Tier 2 Prod hourly case cost*/ "Tier 2 Dev",(114*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)),/*Tier 2 Dev hourly case cost*/ "Tier 3",(273*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)),0) /* Tier 3 hourly case cost*/ ,
CASE(TEXT(Tier__c), /*if Tier is NOT Blank*/ "CSR",(24*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)), /*CSR hourly case cost*/ "Tier 1",(65*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)),/*Tier 1 hourly case cost*/ "Tier 2 Prod",(83*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)),/*Tier 2 Prod hourly case cost*/ "Tier 2 Dev",(95*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)),/*Tier 2 Dev hourly case cost*/ "Tier 3",(95*(WorkIt2__Time_In_Minutes__c/60)),0) /* Tier 3 hourly case cost*/ ) /*INNER IF*/ ) /*IF on the June 23 2021.*/ ) /*WORKIT IF*/ ) /*JULY 2019 IF*/
) /*TOP IF*/
CustomField.label: Case Cost
